alert.note: Alert for Blair; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HUNTINGDON AND NORTHEASTERN BLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tyrone, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Birmingham and Warriors Mark around 315 PM EDT. Sinking Valley around 320 PM EDT. Spruce Creek and Franklinville around 330 PM EDT. Huntingdon around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Petersburg, Alexandria, McConnellstown, Juniata College and Delgrosso`s Amusement Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
